mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT i.movie_num,i.title,i.country,i.main_genre, i.sub_genre,i.poster_img, ru.id,ru.name, ru.rate,ru.reg_date FROM movie_info i JOIN (SELECT r.movie_num, r.id ,r.rate, u.name, r.reg_date reg_date FROM user_info u JOIN movie_rated r ON u.id=r.id WHERE r.id IN (#{id},#{follow}) ORDER BY r.reg_date DESC)ru ON i.movie_num=ru.movie_num)tt

SELECT * FROM (SELECT tt.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT i.movie_num,i.title,i.country,i.main_genre, i.sub_genre,i.poster_img, ru.id,ru.name, ru.rate,ru.reg_date FROM movie_info i JOIN (SELECT r.movie_num, r.id ,r.rate, u.name, r.reg_date reg_date FROM user_info u JOIN movie_rated r ON u.id=r.id WHERE r.id=#{id} ORDER BY r.reg_date DESC)ru ON i.movie_num=ru.movie_num)tt)
WHERE rnum >=#{start} AND rnum <=#{end}
